Class RemoteAdmHandlerBESA

    java.io.Serializable

    public class RemoteAdmHandlerBESA
extends BESA.Kernel.System.Directory.AdmHandlerBESA
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class provides methods to use the remote administrators handlers.
    Since:
    JDK1.0

      • RemoteAdmHandlerBESA

        public RemoteAdmHandlerBESA(java.lang.String admId,
                    java.lang.String aliasAdm,
                    java.lang.String ipRmiRegistry,
                    int portRmiRegistry)
                     throws DistributedDirectoryExceptionBESA
        Builds a new administrator remote handler.
        Parameters:
        aliasAdm - Alias/name of the remote admnistrador.
        ipRmiAddress - The IP address of the machine that contains the BESA administrator.
        rmiPort - The port of the machine that contains the administrator.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the reference for the remote object associated with the specified name is not found.
        DistributedDirectoryExceptionBESA
